titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cairo Genizah Fragment TS E1.101
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a .

note.p: Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection TS E1.103, covering Bava Metsi'a 8:8 9:8.
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, http://www.lib.cam.ac.uk/cgi-bin/GOLD/thumbs?class_mark=T-S_E1.103&search=handlist and https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C193604-C193605

ab.w: A slash above the ה in מתה marks the insertion point.בשעה

ab.label: ח'
ab.note: The traces marked as deletion may be the result of ink bleeding through from the reverse.
ab.w:
? אומר
